DOC.brief_summary: The One Drop Experts Program for Type 2 Diabetes Self-Management Impact on A1c trial is a 12-week long, prospective, intent-to-treat study that aims to evaluate the impact of the One Drop app and Experts program on HbA1c levels for individuals with uncontrolled Type 2 diabetes. A secondary objective will be to evaluate participants who utilize an Apple Watch in combination with the One Drop app and Experts program, and assess whether this group is more engaged or experiences a different impact as compared to participants who utilized the One Drop app and Experts program only.
DOC.brief_title: One Drop Experts Program for Type 2 Diabetes Self-Management: Impact on A1c
